comments: T(i,j) is the number of i-permutations of 13 objects a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m, with repetition allowed, containing j a's. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 21 2007These are the rows of A013619 read right to left. Row sums are A001022(i). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 05 2008
references: B. N. Cyvin et al., Isomer enumeration of unbranched catacondensed polygonal systems with pentagons and heptagons, Match, No. 34 (Oct 1996), pp. 109-121.
maple: for i from 0 to 7 do seq(binomial(i, j)*12^(i-j), j = 0 .. i) od; - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 21 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
